sentences.en: Be he one of the goody or one of the baddies.
Check your goody bag for treats high in sugar or fat.
sentences.cn: 请检查一下你的糖果袋,看看是不是全是高糖和高脂肪的东西.

sentences.en: Don't be such a goody - goody!
Dont give me that do goody good bullshit.
sentences.cn: 戈得很好,给我做不该胡说.

sentences.en: I saw your smiling mask, pretending naivete, no matter what is goody - goody.
sentences.cn: 我再次看见你的微笑, 这纯真化作了伪善的面具.

sentences.en: Introduce overseas advanced technology, goody appearance, logical structure, high efficiency, operate simply.
sentences.cn: 引进国外先进技术, 造型美观, 结构合理, 效率高, 操作简便.

sentences.en: It's not easy being in the goody business these days, huh?
sentences.cn: 这年头要做点心生意真不容易, 是吧?

sentences.en: Look, get out of here and take this flat - chested goody - goody pain in the neck with you.
sentences.cn: 滚出去,带着这个平胸的假道学一起出去.

sentences.en: Now Goody Tiptoes had set to work again by herself.
sentences.cn: 现在糖果脚尖儿自个儿再着手工作.

sentences.en: Now Goody Tiptoes set to work again by herself.
sentences.cn: 现在糖果脚尖儿自个儿再著手工作.
好哇, 还有些蛋糕呢!
哦，太好喽，我喜欢玩游戏。

sentences.en: She's such a goody two shoes.
We bought lots of goodies for the picnic.
sentences.cn: 我们为野餐买了许多好吃的。

sentences.en: We're giving away a free goody bag with every children's meal.
sentences.cn: 每一客儿童餐我们赠送一袋礼品.

words.tran_cn: 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的
感伤的；伪善的；假正经的
糖果；身份低微之老妇；吸引人的东西；伪君子

trans.tran_cn: 感伤的；伪善的；假正经的
太好啦（多用于小孩高兴时），感伤的
美味的甜食，<古>身份低微之老妇
trans.tran_en: something that is nice to eat
